data.actual_result: Discord sometimes jumps to a seemingly random message rather than staying in the same spot after loading more messages (may have to test multiple times to get random jump)
data.expected_result: The message that was in view before loading should stay in view.
data.short_description: When scrolling up with mouse to the point that 'Loading More Messages' shows at the top, chat sometimes jumps to a random spot (only happens when using scroll bar with mouse; canary only?)
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll up until you see 'Load More Messages' - Sometimes after messages load, you end up with a different message in view than before loading - Sometimes you end up with the same message in view as before loading
